title: 3dmaxdisp
description: Reads in a 3D dataset and a DICOM-based affine matrix to output the average and maximum displacement applied to the edge voxels of the 3D dataset's automask.

inset.title: Input Dataset
inset.description: Input dataset file used to form the mask over which displacements will be computed.

matrix.title: Transformation Matrix File
matrix.description: 3x4 affine transformation matrix file applied to the coordinates of the voxels in the dataset mask.
